input.sentences: [female] and [male] walked toward the beach to get married .
they kissed for the cameras before they took their vows .
[male] 's niece was skeptical of this type of casual wedding .
but [female] 's dad was totally on board .
at the reception people had fun | and even the dog was invited .
output.sentences: I am honored today to capture wedding photos for friend Elizabeth's family.
What a breath taking view, as the waves roll in the breeze, to see their tender embrace.
I had to laugh when I realized even little Ashley is amazed at the connection her parents share.
Bill is so happy to finally be walking his daughter down the isle, she looks happy and beautiful.
After the ceremony it's time to relax and lavish the true star of the show!
